pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Snake-OpenCVSnake case OpenCV with type annotations for Python.Note: still in early development## Install```shpip install snake-opencv```## Usage```pyimport snake_opencv as cvpath = '..'image = cv.imread(path)assert image is not Nonegray_image = cv.cvt_color(image, cv.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)cv.imshow(window_name, gray_image) ```
